data.title: Connect the Huffington family, as well as Julia Roberts and Lyle Lovett to AJ?
data.meta_description: Hey there WikiTreers!  I have been working on this connection for AJ for about a week now and it ...   Thanks everyone! No deadline on this one :)
data.text:
Zara, AJ isn't a Roberts. There are eight marriages between AJ and Walter Grady Roberts. See this page for the connection between them.

We use the connection to AJ by blood, marriage, or adoption to indicate that a person is connected to the six million ancestor profiles on WikiTree that are linked to each other. There are over nine million profiles in total, so we love to see everyone linked to the global tree in some way.

I don't see ancestor profiles here for the Aaron and John H. Roberts you mentioned. I hope you'll add them to WikiTree. You might like to start a new G2G question about them to collaborate with the many generous and knowledgeable genealogists here on WikiTree!
